#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000
#define SIZE 25
long long fa[33];
long long c[33][33];
int main()
{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	long long re;
	int T;
	int flag;
	int i,n,j,t;
	fa[0]=fa[1]=1;
	for(i=2;i<=20;i++)
		fa[i]=fa[i-1]*i;
	c[1][0]=c[1][1]=1;
	for(i=2;i<=20;i++)
	{
		c[i][0]=c[i][i]=1;
		for(j=1;j<i;j++)
			c[i][j]=c[i-1][j-1]+c[i-1][j];
	}
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		re=fa[n];
		t=n;
		flag=-1;
		while(t--)
		{
			re=re+flag*fa[t]*c[n][t];
			flag=-flag;
		}
		cout<<re<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
